item.title: Trump says admin 'going to be taking away' Harvard's tax exempt status
item.description: "It's what they deserve," he said, renewing his threat in a Truth Social post.

item.title: Trump replacing Waltz as national security adviser, Rubio takes role for now
item.description: Trump said he's nominating Michael Waltz to be ambassador to the United Nations, while Secretary of State Marco Rubio will serve as interim national s...

item.title: WATCH: 500 dachshunds try to set world record
item.description: The dashing dachshunds descended upon Budapest in an attempt to fetch the record for the largest single-breed dog walk.

item.title: Prince Harry loses bid to reinstate security on visits to UK
item.description: Harry challenged a U.K. government decision about his security.

item.title: Man charged with attempted murder in hit-and-run outside church preschool
item.description: The man accused of driving into two children and an adult in a hit-and-run outside a preschool at a South Carolina church has been charged.
